          <title>
            <string language="en">Hazards from nuclear power stations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gefahren von Atomkraftwerk</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Risques des centrales nucléaires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Perigos das estações de potência nuclear</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rischi dalle centrali nucleari</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κίνδυνοι από τους σταθμούς πυρηνικής ενέργειας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Peligros de centrales nucleares</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows three cans of dangerous radioactive wastes from a nuclear power station.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>

            <string language="en">Hazards</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt drei Dosen gefährliche 
radioaktive Abfälle von Atomkraftwerk.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre trois bidons de déchets
radioactifs dangereux d'une centrale nucléaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra três latas de 
desperdícios radioativos perigosos de uma estação de potência 
nuclear.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra tre latte degli 
effluenti radioattivi pericolosi da una centrale nucleare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τρία δοχεία των 
επικίνδυνων ραδιενεργών αποβλήτων από έναν σταθμό πυρηνικής 
ενέργειας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra tres latas de desechos 
radioactivos peligrosos de una central nuclear.</string>
          </description>
